Megatron tightened his grip around Perceptor's throat, and 
sneered. "Yes, Megatron, the greatest Decepticon. If you know that, 
then you know not to toy with me, Blindfear, now I recognize you. 
Where did you disapear to after all those years." Megatron finished, 
then gritted his teeth, "and, more importantly, do you claim to be a 
Predacon?"
